feed.title: Category: Packt | Freelance .NET Web Developer in Mumbai

entry.title: Reviewed Mastering Entity Framework : Packt Publications
entry.content:
Last year in the month of November 2014 , Project Cordinators at Packt Publications requested me to review a book for them and that book was about Entity Framwork “Mastering Entity Framework” still in Pre-Publication Published.

This was my first time and it was a great experience to review a book for Packt Publication that too a book of my interest “Entity Framework”.

Abhishek Luv is a Software Engineer at Develop2Deploy and a Co-Founder at The Video Trainer where he helps people, master the basics of Video Making in just one day. Get more info
